JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW WEDNESDAY ,THE O9TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 19TH POUSHA, 1940 Cr1.MC.No. 169 of 2019 cc 198/2013 OF J.M.F.C.,PALA CRIME NO. 493/2009 OF PALA POLICE STATION , KOTTAYAM PETITIONER/S: RENJITH AGED 37 YEARS S/O. RAMAKRISHNAN, RESIDING AT VATTOLIL VEEDU, NAALUVETUKARA, MURINGOOR THEKKUMURI VILLAGE, KORATTI PANCHAYATH, THRISSUR DISTRICT. BY ADVS. SRI .PREMCHAND R.NAIR SMT .K.SREEKALA DEVI SRI .GEORGE BRISTON SRI.R.SARACHANDRA KUMAR SRI .V.P.PRASANTH RESPONDENT/S: STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, PALA POLICE STATION, REPRESENTED THROUGH PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, KOCHI 682 031. OTHER PRESENT: SRI. ALEX M THOMBRA SR PP Eger Baar 2019/KER/1041 Cr1.MC.No. 169 of 2019 1i2.. THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING : ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. The petitioner is the accused in CC No. 198 of 2013 on the file of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-I, Pala. He prays that the learned magistrate be directed to dispose of the case without further delay. 3. I have perused Annexure A copy of the proceedings sheet of the trial court. The case is ripe for trial. The learned magistrate has already issued summons to CW1 to CW12. Having regard to these facts, I am inclined to allow the request of the petitioner. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed. The learned magistrate is directed to dispose of Eger * are 4 ae Beas 2019/KER/1041 Cri.MC.No. 169 of 2019 1.3... the case within six months from the date of receipt or production of a copy of this order, whichever is earlier. Sd/- K. ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE A A TRUE READABLE COPY OF THE ORDER SHEET IN C.C NO. 198/2013 ON THE FILES OF JFCM-1,PALA Bka/10.01.2019
